SELECT '磨浮' as 'devName', MAX(CASE WHEN spot='轴向速度1' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a1', MAX(CASE WHEN spot='水平速度1' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a2', MAX(CASE WHEN spot='垂直速度1' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a3', MAX(CASE WHEN spot='温度1' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a4', MAX(CASE WHEN spot='轴向速度2' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a5', MAX(CASE WHEN spot='水平速度2' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a6', MAX(CASE WHEN spot='垂直速度2' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a7', MAX(CASE WHEN spot='温度2' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a8', MAX(CASE WHEN spot='结构' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a9', MAX(CASE WHEN spot='干油润滑站' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a10', MAX(CASE WHEN spot='轴向速度3' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a11', MAX(CASE WHEN spot='水平速度3' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a12', MAX(CASE WHEN spot='垂直速度3' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a13', MAX(CASE WHEN spot='温度3' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a14', MAX(CASE WHEN spot='轴向速度4' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a15', MAX(CASE WHEN spot='水平速度4' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a16', MAX(CASE WHEN spot='垂直速度4' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a17', MAX(CASE WHEN spot='温度4' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a18', MAX(CASE WHEN spot='高低压润滑系统' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a19'
FROM (SELECT (CASE
WHEN SC_PART='进料端轴承轴向速度' THEN '轴向速度2' WHEN SC_PART='进料端轴承水平速度' THEN '水平速度2' WHEN SC_PART='进料端轴承垂直速度' THEN '垂直速度2' WHEN SC_PART='进料端轴承座温度' THEN '温度2' WHEN SC_PART='出料端轴承轴向速度' THEN '轴向速度1' WHEN SC_PART='出料端轴承水平速度' THEN '水平速度1' WHEN SC_PART='出料端轴承垂直速度' THEN '垂直速度1' WHEN SC_PART='出料端轴承座温度' THEN '温度1' WHEN SC_PART='进料端小齿轮轴承轴向速度' THEN '轴向速度4' WHEN SC_PART='进料端小齿轮轴承水平速度' THEN '水平速度4' WHEN SC_PART='进料端小齿轮轴承垂直速度' THEN '垂直速度4' WHEN SC_PART='进料端小齿轮轴承座温度' THEN '温度4' WHEN SC_PART='出料端小齿轮轴承轴向速度' THEN '轴向速度3' WHEN SC_PART='出料端小齿轮轴承水平速度' THEN '水平速度3' WHEN SC_PART='出料端小齿轮轴承垂直速度' THEN '垂直速度3' WHEN SC_PART='出料端小齿轮轴承座温度' THEN '温度3' WHEN devName='再磨机结构' THEN '结构' WHEN devName='再磨机干油润滑站' THEN '干油润滑站' WHEN ZONE_NAME='再磨机稀油润滑系统' THEN '高低压润滑系统' END )as spot, (CASE WHEN RESULT='停机不检' THEN RESULT WHEN ((ZONE_NAME='再磨机稀油润滑系统' OR devName='再磨机干油润滑站' OR devName='再磨机结构') AND (ALTPID = 2 OR ALTPID=1)) THEN '故障' WHEN ((ZONE_NAME='再磨机稀油润滑系统' OR devName='再磨机干油润滑站' OR devName='再磨机结构') AND (ALTPID = 0)) THEN '正常' WHEN (ALTPID=1 OR ALTPID=2) THEN CONCAT(RESULT,'故障') ELSE RESULT END ) as tempResult
FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE (devName='再磨机传动部电机' OR devName='再磨机传动齿轮' OR devName='再磨机干油润滑站' OR devName='再磨机结构' OR ZONE_NAME='再磨机稀油润滑系统' ) AND -- YEARWEEK(date_format(TASKSTART_TM, '%Y-%m-%d'),1) = YEARWEEK(now(), 1)-- 一周数据（测试用） to_days(TASKSTART_TM) = to_days(now())-- 当天数据 GROUP BY spot) as temp

SELECT '生产' as 'devName', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='筒体端面' THEN temResult end ) as 'a1', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='流量计' THEN temResult end ) as 'a2', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='补加水阀' THEN temResult end ) as 'a3', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='补加水管' THEN temResult end ) as 'a4', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='甘油喷射系统' THEN temResult end ) as 'a5', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='排矿浓度' THEN temResult end ) as 'a6', MAX(CASE WHEN devName ='MQY2745高低压稀油润滑系统' and SC_CONTENT='是否漏油' THEN temResult end ) as 'a7', MAX(CASE WHEN devName ='MQY2745高低压稀油润滑系统' and SC_CONTENT='冷却水是否正常' THEN temResult end ) as 'a8' FROM ( SELECT devName,SC_CONTENT,SC_PART, ( CASE WHEN RESULT='停机不检' THEN RESULT WHEN (ALTPID = 2 OR ALTPID=1) THEN '故障' WHEN ALTPID=0 THEN '正常' END
)temResult from dxj_spot_result where DEPT_NAME = '磨浮生产' AND ROUTE_NAME = '磨矿岗' and (devName='MQY2745再磨机'OR devName = 'MQY2745高低压稀油润滑系统') )as tmp
